name: Zeus: The Game
overview: A single player puzzle\shape matching game in the style of Puzznic. Coding & graphics by Crazy/Zeus; levels by Sledge/Zeus. Music by Richard Holmes (Snake/Zeus). The original release of ZEUS: THE GAME contains a bug on level 32 involving a block that cannot be paired, which makes it impossible to proceed beyond this level to complete the game. Fortunately, a bugfixed version was released on EAB in 2017. Also released in the Spielekiste #617 PD compilation disk.
